component.name: org.nuxeo.ecm.core.api.DocumentAdapterService
component.documentation: Service providing a dynamic adapter mechanism to adapt documents to random interfaces. @author Bogdan Stefanescu (bs@nuxeo.com)

extension-point.name: adapters
extension-point.documentation:
Extension Point for registering new document adapters XML extensions may contain any number of 'adapter' elements of the form:
This means any document having the facet 'facet' can be adapted to a 'class' object using the factory 'factory'
The facet attribute is optional and serve to restrict the aplicability of the adapter. If no facet is specified the adapter will be aapplicable on any document.

extension-point.name: sessionAdapters
extension-point.documentation: Extension Point for registering new core service adapters. Each contribution should specify the interface of the adapter and an adapter factory class

extension-point.name: propertyFactories
